page.title: 07FARMING YEAR
page.content:
SUMMARY OF FARMING YEAR
January :- Early lambing, AI cows
February:- Spring barley cultivations, AI Cows, Lambing. March :- Top dress winter wheat and winter barley, cultivations and drilling of Spring barley, top dress oil seed rape,main lambing. April :- Roll & top dress winter wheat, roll, spray & top dress winter barley. Roll spring barley. Top dress oil seed rape. Cows out to grass. Late lambing. May :- Spray winter wheat, spring barley.Oil seed rape (in flower).Silage. First lambs sold.
